metadata.description: Amanda Waller’s Squad completed another mission--and in her opinion, it was worth the price they paid. But if that prize can’t save her from the Spectre, she’ll come up with another way to stave off death. Jason Blood might be her new ally, but it’s certain that her new team won’t appreciate his contribution. Is membership on the Suicide Squad really better than imprisonment at Belle Reve?
metadata.name: Suicide Squad: Hell to Pay
